title: Correction to: The use of PIPAC (pressurized intraperitoneal aerosol chemotherapy) in gynecological oncology: a statement by the Arbeitsgemeinschaft Gynaekologische Onkologie (AGO) Kommission Ovar, AGO Study Group, North-Eastern German Society of Gynaecologic Oncology (NOGGO), AGO Austria and AGO Switzerland
